original_text: So he overlaid the whole interior with gold. He also overlaid with gold the altar that belonged to the inner sanctuary.
korean_text: 온 성전을 금으로 입히기를 마치고 내소에 속한 제단의 전부를 금으로 입혔더라

sentences.original_text: So he overlaid the whole interior with gold.
He also overlaid with gold the altar
that belonged to the inner sanctuary.
